alert.note: Alert for Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 6:40PM CST until March 07 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties. Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River Near Bentonia. * WHEN...Until late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...At 23.5 feet, Agricultural land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:00 PM CST Thursday was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.0 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Big Black River Bentonia 22.0 22.2 Thu 6 pm CST 22.9 22.7 21.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 900 AM CST.
